Posts.Content: Oct 6, 2007 11:30PM rosemom wrote: nothing could be salty enough for me!  i remember actually examining my potato chips, being able to see all the salt on them, but then thinking that it wasn't enough.  one thing i did for the bad taste in my mouth was york peppermint patties.  the smallest nibble gave me relief.  i bought a bag of the smaller-sized ones, and always kept one next to my bed at nite so that i could break off a tiny piece.  popsicles, they were helpful, too.
Posts.Title: Craving crunchy salty chips after chemo trigeek kagaines
